A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really want to like it\, but I remember being restless in the theater waiting for the story line to pick up or cover major plot points. The humor didn't work with me\, unlike previous installments. At best\, it wastes a lot of time\, at worst\, it throws everything from episode 7 out the window\, which will make rewatching The Last Jedi pointless as I can't trust that Episode 9 won't throw everything this movie established out the window too.
